the_good_things: The repository provides an AI-powered toolkit for analyzing and classifying academic research publications, supports multiple output formats (MongoDB, JSON, Excel), and offers detailed documentation and installation instructions.
could_be_better: The repository could improve on its user interface for non-technical users and offer more examples of advanced use cases.
technologies_used: Python, MongoDB, OpenAI API, Crossref API, Sphinx for documentation.
other_notes: The project is actively maintained with frequent updates, and it is also available on PyPI for easy installation.
